parameters:
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>...I'm sorry. Even though we're looking after him, he's
originally from another town, as he says. Maybe that's why
he lacks a sense of camaraderie and awareness of the current
state of affairs...
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Ah, if it isn't Miss Segi.
\N<Segi>Good afternoon.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>It's rare to see you here. You're not the type to use tools
meant for hurting others, right?
\N<Segi>No, I... that's not what I...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>It's fine, that's a normal human reaction. Especially for a
woman like you.
\N<Segi>...I'm sorry.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Even so... things have gotten pretty serious. I wonder what
will become of our town from now on.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>I understand how you feel, but in times like these, it's
wise to have something to protect yourself with.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>If you're okay with it, I'm always here to listen. I'll even
give you a discount on the goods here.
\N<Segi>I see... Thank you very much.
\N<Boy>...
\N<Segi>Ah...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey, how about a greeting? We're all part of the same town,
aren't we?
\N<Fubii>Ahaha, comrades? Who? You mean you and that old lady?

\N<Fubii>Unfortunately, I've never thought of myself as part of the
group. I'm originally from another town, after all.
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>What? You think you can get by with that attitude...
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey! Wait!
\N<Segi>...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>...I'm sorry. Even though he's under my care, he's right;
he's originally from another town. Maybe that's why he lacks
a sense of camaraderie and awareness of the current
crisis...
\N<Segi>No, it's fine. I'm not bothered by it.

\N<Segi>Besides, it's not unreasonable. It's too much to expect
someone his age to come to an unknown town alone and open up
his heart right away.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Really sorry. It helps to hear you say that. Despite
appearances, he's not a bad kid at all.
A
